Package notification

Interface CommunicationStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ComNetAdaptator, MailCommunication, SmsCommunication, XmessCommunication
interface CommunicationStrategy
Abstract interface describing the public interface of all communication methods.

  • Method Details

    • envoyer

      void envoyer(String clientName, String adresse, String message)
      This method allows to send a message to a client
      Parameters:
      clientName - The name of the client
      adresse - The communication methods to contact the client
      message - The message send to the client

    • isCorrect

      default boolean isCorrect(String adresse)
      This method allows to find a syntax error in the address depending on the chosen mode
      Parameters:
      adresse - The communication methods to contact the client
      Returns:
      True or False if the address is correct or not
